name: Idiopathic Membranous Nephropathy with Secondary Focal Segmental Glomerulosclerosis
chief_complaint: My legs are swollen, and I feel extremely tired all the time.
prognosis: Guarded - 40% progress to ESRD within 10 years without treatment
description: A rare dual glomerulopathy featuring both membranous nephropathy and FSGS patterns, likely representing either coincident diseases or FSGS developing secondary to longstanding nephrotic syndrome from membranous nephropathy. The condition causes massive proteinuria and nephrotic syndrome through distinct but synergistic pathological mechanisms.
risk_factors: Exposure to certain medications (NSAIDs, gold salts)
multiple_choice: Idiopathic Membranous Nephropathy with Secondary Focal Segmental Glomerulosclerosis
